WorkItem.Description:
When I go to a WCF web service exposed from BizTalk I receive the error below:
 
http://localhost/WcfSqlService/AdvWrksProduct.svc
loading http://localhost/WcfSqlService/AdvWrksProduct.svc
Acquiring the wsdl...
Resolving the wsdlendpoint...
Generating code...
Code generation failed.
Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FailureException: Assembly not yet created.
at Storm.Types.WebSvcManagerOps.clo@90.CreateWebServiceModel()
at <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_2.Invoke(DoWorkEventArgs dArgs)
at <StartupCode$Storm>.$Type.bgworker.run@51@57_1.Invoke(Object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.OnDoWork(DoWorkEventArgs e)
at System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.WorkerThreadStart(Object argument)
 
Any ideas. Saw releated issue around WCF.
WorkItem.Summary: "Assembly not yet created" when calling BizTalk WCF service

Comments.Message: WCF is not supported by Storm.  Perhaps you'd be interested in WCFStorm(http://www.wcfstorm.com)?
